answerText: The Chairs [or Les chaises][10] The Chairs is a work by this Romanian absurdist playwright, who wrote about the inhabitants of a village transforming into animals in his play Rhinoceros.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 10 | 16 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The two main characters in this play end up killing themselves by jumping out of the window. For 10 points each: [10] Name this play in which the Old Man and the Old Woman prepare for the arrival of an orator.
